name: Bygone City
description:
Unfinished submit for Multiplayer Game Jam,  that will be updated in the following days.

Bygone City Team: We've put our best efforts into creating a game for the Multiplayer Game Jam. Letting bygone's be bygone's. We've decided to share our best efforts, even if that means submitting our game in an unfinished state. We will be updating our game to make it both better and into a more polished state, with the intention of fleshing out the mechanics and features to complete our vision.

"It's not how you start that's important, but how you finish!”

Some art snippets that we couldn't get properly working

Credits: Art:
  • Characters: Yeramia
  • Tileset: Dark Platformer 2 by Szadi Art
Sound & Audio Design :
  • Audio: Bradley Donahue - Near/Far
  • Music: Near/Far
Game design:
  • Francisco Roldan (zPikA)
  • Shad-
Programming:
  • Tomas Fernández
  • Augusto Velasco

This game was made for the Multiplayer Game Jam.
